CustomField.description: If existing deal code for this deal is marked dead, please confirm if historic costs incurred can be recuperated, if this deal results in a consummated deal (i.e. portfolio company).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If existing deal code for this deal is marked dead, please confirm if historic costs incurred can be recuperated, if this deal results in a consummated deal (i.e. portfolio company).
CustomField.label: Create new code or revive old
